column4: Some help please. I'm using a ubuntu live cd on a Dell 4300 and get's past the load bar. Then it tries to bring up the desktop but hangs. It never goes into the desktop where you can actually install ubuntu. Any suggestions. I've tried ubuntu and edubuntu
You either have a hardware issue (something needs fixing or re-configuring), or you need to use alternative CD.
/ usr13: 30gb hdd, 128mb Ram, ethernet card, AGP video card. CD/Rom
/ usr13: P4, idk the video card hope it's not ati. The mouse works right now just no desktop
/ usr13: possible to image HDD on different pc then put back on the 128mb ram computer?
try Ctrl-Alt-F1    and then do:  less /proc/cpuinfo
/ usr13: nothing, i'll get more ram for it
/ usr13: the terminal came up on my screen what should i do?
And, tell us what video card you have.
